word_mean: 隐花植物：无真花的低等植物，以孢子繁殖

sentence.Network_en: In the Braun - Blaoquet school the description of synusial associations was not confined to cryptogam communities.
sentence.Network_cn: 在 Braun -Blaoquet学派中,层片群丛的描述不限于隐花植物群落.

sentence.Network_en: Cryptogam In early classifications, any plant that reproduces by spores or gametes rather than by seeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 隐花植物:在早期分类学中, 任何产生孢子或配子而不是种子的植物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文芝柿”,宋代苏颂《图经本草》说:“(茯苓)附根而生,无苗、叶、花、实”,都说明菌类是没有根、茎、叶之分的,它是一年可多次形成子实体的隐花植物(cryptogam).
in the Braun-Blaoquet school the description of synusial associations was not confined to cryptogam communities .在Braun-Blaoquet学派中，层片群丛的描述不限于隐花植物群落。

cryptobion 隐藏性生物cryptogamic community 隐花植物群落cryptopelagic 冰下漂游性
any of a group of cryptogamic organisms consisting principally of a thallus and thus showing no differentiation andand leaf .任何种类的隐花有机体，主要由叶状体组成，根茎叶无区别。
vascular cambium 维管束形成层vascular cryptogam 维管束隐花植物vascular cylinder 中心柱

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French cryptogame, from modern Latin cryptogamae (plantae), denoting non-flowering plants, from Greek kruptos 'hidden' + gamos 'marriage' (because the means of reproduction was not apparent)

means.word_mean: 1. formerly recognized taxonomic group including all flowerless and seedless plants that reproduce by means of spores: ferns, mosses, algae, fungi
